about_the_game:
Unsung Warriors is a 2D action-adventure game. The world of Unsung Warriors is set in Iron-Age inspired Europe, among various Celtic tribes. It mixes fantasy elements with European folk tales and mythology. The game can be played solo or in couch co-op mode. Enjoy beautiful handcrafted levels. Fight against ferocious enemies and discover the many secrets of this ancient world.

What to expect?

  • Single player & couch co-op mode
  • Explore a vast world with interesting locations
  • Battle against ferocious enemies and bosses
  • Immersive main story and engaging side quests
  • Meet interesting characters. Some of them can even become your friend
  • Equip a wide variety of weapons, spells and other items
  • Buy or sell equipment at a shop (no in-app purchases)
  • Learn powerful new abilities
  • An adventure filled with small jokes and surprises
  • Set in a universe inspired by barbarian tribes in Europe
  • Multiple endings depending on the choices you make
  • Keyboard, touchscreen & controller support (rumble included)
  • A team dedicated to giving you a great gaming experience!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Broadwell i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 on Mac Mini 2014 (1.4Ghz model)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Storage: 2 GB available space
